name: Lamland Adventure
description:
Hello friends, this game is my entry for the BenBonk Game Jam #3, made in just 72 Hours - with the theme of "2 Sides!" If you start playing the game, and don't really see how it fits the theme, just keep on playing - I chose to go with 2 Sides as more of a narrative theme, rather than gameplay, so you really have to see how the story plays out!

Note: Video Devlog Coming Soon!

Overall, I think this game turned out extremely well despite the fact that it was 110 degrees here every day while I was working on it! I'm quite proud of it, and I hope you have a fun time playing it!

Huge shout-outs to Insandio for composing me another absolute banger for a soundtrack for this game, as well as Extranji, for playtesting and finding approximately a hundred thousand bugs.

==SPOILER==
The final screen of the game mentions that there are 13 hidden collectables, but there are actually only 9. Apparently I forgot how to count when I was making the final screen lmao

Attribution:
I used a wonderful sound effects pack that I found on OpenGameArt for some of the sound effects in the game (the ones I didn't create myself.)
You can find the creator (Little Robot Sound Factory) here: www.littlerobotsoundfactory.com
